Name: Hooks And Shotguns
About the game: In this Bullet Hell Platformer, you play as a twin named Xenon, And when your brother is attacked and then forced into a soul trap, which was then smashed into 4 separate gems. So armed with only a shotgun, a hook-shot, and a will to save your brother, you must defeat your greatest enemy, SILO!
